description: The _load_all_extensions_from_path() method ends its inner loop by calling first the _check_extension() method, then the _add_extension() method, which seems to make sense...until you look at _add_extension() and realize that it also calls _check_extension().  This is really just cosmetic, as all _check_extension() does is log information about the extension.  (This is in trunk.)
title: ExtensionManager checks extensions twice

comments.content: The _load_all_extensions_from_path() method ends its inner loop by calling first the _check_extension() method, then the _add_extension() method, which seems to make sense...until you look at _add_extension() and realize that it also calls _check_extension().  This is really just cosmetic, as all _check_extension() does is log information about the extension.  (This is in trunk.)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~klmitch
